createEvent.title: Create Event

hostMatchmakingInfo.title: Matchmaking Participation
hostMatchmakingInfo.description: As the wedding host, you won't be able to matchmake by default. If you'd like to participate in matchmaking, simply join your own event using the invite code after creating it.

createEvent.shareCode: Share your event code with guests
